meanings.definition: To respond to something said or written.
meanings.sent1: She always replies to her emails promptly.
meanings.sent2: He replies to his friend's text messages quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat replies to the sound of its name with a meow.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seem to reply to the sun's warmth by blooming.
meanings.sent5: The student replies to the teacher's question confidently.

meanings.definition: A response to something said or written.
meanings.sent1: I received many replies to my job application.
meanings.sent2: The survey collected various replies from the participants.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected reply to the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the perfect reply to his kind gesture.
meanings.sent5: The reply to the invitation was a heartfelt thank you note.
